transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji, Vijay sir se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji, namaste sir. Main apni baat kar rahi thi IndiaMART se.
Actually aapne abhi na kuch leads ko na not relevant mark kiya aapka.
Haan. Matlab jaise jo aapko aapke kaam ki nahi lagi hongi, hai na? Shayad is wajah se.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ek minute. To sir usme na jaise aapne jo reason hai na woh galat mark kar diya hoga. Jaise koi product aapke catalog mein already add hai.
Lekin phir bhi aapne usko not relevant mark kar diya. Jaise aapke paas anti-static epoxy flooring service ki lead aayi thi Mahendragarh se, theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Isme aapne jo lead hai usko kyun not relevant mark kiya tha?
Customer: Ji, kyunki aapki jo leads aa rahi hai anti-static ki woh purchase karne ke baad mujhe residential hai karke bol raha hai.
Matlab ghar mein karwana hai kar ke liye. Matlab koi bhi inquiries aa rahi hai.
Executive: Lekin aapne jo isme reason lagaya hai na woh wrong BLM matlab M-cat lagaya hai. Kyunki aapki category nahi hai.
Jaise aapne kisi kisi mein location ka issue lagaya hai, hai na?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ki yeh dusri location se aayi hai. Jaise ek Hyderabad se aayi thi anti-static karke. Ek Jhansi se aayi thi.
Uske baad ek Balrampur se aayi thi. Sabse aapne location ka lagaya hai Ballia aur Noida mein. Ballia aur Noida ki aapko lead nahi chahiye?
Customer: Ji, nahi chahiye us location ki mujhe.
Executive: Achha. Lekin sir kya hai na jaise ek matlab epoxy flooring service mein aap kaam kar sakte hain. Epoxy flooring service category ki wajah se yeh lead aapke paas show hui. To isme agar aap wrong BLM cat ka aap woh lagaoge na reason, to woh galat ho jayega.
Samajhne ki koshish kar rahe ho?
Matlab hamara maksad yeh hai ki zyada se zyada lead aap tak pahunch sake. Ab epoxy flooring mein...
Customer: Abhi main search karenge to mera mera isme dekh deta woh pura anti-static wala hi leads dikha raha hai, show kar raha hai. Par jo main purchase karta hu woh mera lead waste ja raha hai. Residential hi purchase ho raha hai pura.
Haan sir, third wala inquiries aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hmm. Sir dekhiye maine aapko pehle bhi jab aapne renewal shayad karaya tha tab bhi maine aapko bola tha ki aap apna steel mein kara lijiye to aapko zyada achhe inquiries aur calls wagera aayenge aur zyada aayenge as compared to abhi.
Abhi jaise aap 70 lead kar pa rahe ho to waha pe aap zyada kar pa ke lead kar sakte ho.
Customer: Nahi na par aise pehle pehle aise nahi ho raha tha na madam. Abhi ho raha hai mere ko.
Executive: Sir kabhi kabhi ho jata hai. Aisa hai ki aapko nahi mil pata hai woh to aapko offline mein bhi rehta hai na order kabhi kabhi nahi aa paate hain.
Par aisa nahi hai ki aapko aayega hi.
Customer: Kya chal raha hai madam? Aise matlab aisi inquiry nahi aa rahi thi mere ko ki anti-static ka dikha raha hai aur residential ka aa raha hai. Main search kar raha hu aisa mujhe answer milta hai baad mein.
Khali dekh raha tha woh IndiaMART wale kuch bhi dal dete hai search kiya to bhi. Aise mere ko answer aa rahe hai logo se, customer se.
Executive: Haan. Sir dekho aapne abhi September mein hi apna renewal karaya tha.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To abhi aapka amount kaafi sara adjust ho jayega. Agar aap karana chaho to kara sakte ho jisse ki aapko yeh problem na aaye.
Customer: Nahi nahi main kya main kya baat kar raha hu. Abhi mere ko pehla to problem nahi aaya tha abhi kyun ho raha hai aisa?
Executive: Sir ho sakta hai koi category wagera change ki ho isliye aisa ho raha hoga.
Customer: Haan ji?
Executive: Ho sakta hai aapne koi category wagera change ki ho isliye aisa ho raha hoga.
Customer: Nahi abhi to filhaal koi category wagera change nahi kiya madam. Yeh to aapko shayad pehle bhi aa rahi thi na yeh wali cheez?
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa nahi hua tha.
Executive: Haan. Par yeh anti-static ka mere ko aa raha hai abhi khali. Zyada anti-static ka hi inquiry hai mere mein isme search karenge to aapko dikh jayega.
Executive: To aapko nahi chahiye anti-static?
Customer: Anti-static wala nahi chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Achha. Ek minute. Chahiye par woh residential aa raha hai na madam. Koi matlab hi nahi usme woh khali.
Customer: Ek to yeh anti-skid epoxy flooring category lagi hai.
Customer: Woh bolta hai main khali search kar raha tha woh IndiaMART wala mera number dal rahe hai kisi ko bhi aisa bol rahe hai. Mere ko hi ulta woh customer suna raha hai.
Executive: Epoxy floor coating service ki lead lagi hai. Iske bare mein kuch aap dekhiye thoda kya hota hai kya nahi thoda.
Yaha pe anti-static flooring service ki lead woh lagi hai sir category anti-static.
Customer: Haan sahi hai madam usme kaam karta hu main. Main kya bola aapko? Usme residential wali requirement mismatch wali aa rahi hai mere ko madam.
Executive: Actually yaha pe na aapki industrial aur commercial ki humne lead woh category laga rakhi hai. Lekin ab jaise commonly matlab aa jati hai na jaise epoxy floor service ki lagai.
Customer: Woh commercial wala hata dijiye usme sir madam. Usme ka commercial.
Executive: Ek minute. Commercial epoxy flooring service hata di. Yaha pe industrial kar du?
Customer: Haan industrial kar do.
Executive: Theek hai. Yeh aapne product ka naam hi commercial epoxy flooring service kar rakha hai actually.
Customer: To phir woh change kara dijiye madam.
Executive: Product ka naam industrial kar du?
Customer: Haan industrial kariye.
Executive: Ek minute. Industrial epoxy flooring service.
Yeh change kar diya maine.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Ab ek baar check kar lijiye.
Customer: Abhi main thoda network mein nahi hu. Main baad mein thoda sa check karta hu.
Executive: Theek hai. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving residential inquiries for anti-static flooring.

- Wrong category leads are being shown.

- Customer is receiving negative feedback from customers.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the issue with marking leads.

- Changed product name to industrial epoxy flooring service.

- Removed commercial epoxy flooring service category.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check the changes later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, category, anti-static, industrial, commercial
